blackbeard:Ssssserpent.NAME: The Ssssserpent
DESCRIPTIONS: "Ho, ho, hooo! NL NL I appreciate your enthusiasm. NL NL Gold and treasuresssss. Gold and treasuresssss. NL ~GOLD~ ~AND~ ~TREASURESSSSS.~ NL NL ~Take~ ~thissssss!~ @*TAKE*@ @*THISSSSSS*!"@
OPTIONS: #gGold. #gGain #ga #gRelic. You have no doubt in your mind.

blackbeard:Vampires.NAME: Vampires(?)
DESCRIPTIONS: "Oh, so you are interested in the weaponry enchanted with our ~POWER?~ NL NL Very well, for the gold you are offering I can give you this #y~Vampiric~ #y~Scepter.~ NL NL Perhaps next time you will join us, to #rfeed with your own teeth."

#y<Once #yupon #ya #ytime #yin #ya #ysmall #ytavern, #yin #ythe #ymiddle #yof #ynowhere> NL - @Barkeeper!@ Give me your strongest rum!!! NL - The strongest rum in this tavern? Are you sure? I knew only one man who could drink it... he was a great pirate... the greatest pirate... NL - Knew him? Ha, that man is only a myth. And you say you knew him? Hahahaha. ~That's~ ~ridiculous.~ NL - Oh, he existed and I have a proof. Look at this golden coin he paid me with... he had 10000 of such coins. He loved gold, even more than rum from this tavern... NL - 10000 golden coins? So where is he now? And where are his treasures? NL - He still wanted more... He should have never made a deal with this talking whale... NL - Wait, what? ~A...~ ~talking...~ ~whale?...~
